project_abstract.cdata: The project would provide NIDB with: (a) foreign exchange resources for funding: (i) industrial investment projects and (ii) consultancy services for further strengthening its institutional capabilities. A large part of the subloans financed under the project is expected to be in priority subsectors such as intermediate goods, agroindustries, and the construction industry.
